pullrequest.title: Implement orchestration for sdformat, gazebo and ignition

content.raw:
Note that in the workflow DSL there is a property called 'propagate: '. It is [set to false](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/211/implement-orchestration-for-sdformat/diff#Ljenkins-scripts/dsl/_configs_/OSRFCIWorkFlow.groovyT69) for all the set status jobs which implies that the job status is not propagated to the orchestration job.

This means that if something in the set status failed, the orchestration will keep going and call compilation anyway.

In this context, I prefer to fail the job if something bad happen but manage the failure in the orchestration that should be exactly for these actions.
content.html:
Note that in the workflow DSL there is a property called 'propagate: '. It is set to false for all the set status jobs which implies that the job status is not propagated to the orchestration job.

This means that if something in the set status failed, the orchestration will keep going and call compilation anyway.

In this context, I prefer to fail the job if something bad happen but manage the failure in the orchestration that should be exactly for these actions.
